item.description:
Our group had a wonderful time here last summer! They have a dine in special on all sushi Sundays through Thursdays. Last year, if was half price. Sadly, this year they have changed it to 40% off...but that still is a GREAT special. Last year we ordered SO MUCH sushi and only paid $20.00 each! And to make it even better, the quality of the food was excellent, with innovative rolls like the "Valentine Roll" with cranberry sauce and the "Fruit Roll" which combines strawberries, jalapenos and kiwi sauce...AND the service was even great, too.

http://noblejapanesec...

As an extra summer treat, there is a Rita's right at the other end of the parking lot. We will go there afterward.
http://www.ritasfranc...

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: 40% off Sushi...followed by Rita's!
